member.name: T:WebDX.Api.WDESessionStatus
member.summary: The session status. Determines the status of a document or batch. Used by the WebDE Client in determining work to be processed.

member.name: F:WebDX.Api.WDESessionStatus.None
member.summary: The batch or document has not been processed.

member.name: F:WebDX.Api.WDESessionStatus.Completed
member.summary: The batch or document has been processed.

member.name: F:WebDX.Api.WDESessionStatus.Canceled
member.summary: The batch or document was cancelled by the user.

member.name: F:WebDX.Api.WDESessionStatus.Rejected
member.summary: The batch or document was rejected by the user.

member.summary: The field has not been processed.

member.name: F:WebDX.Api.WDEFieldFlags.Active
member.summary: The field is currently being processed.

member.summary: The field has been plugged by program code.

member.name: F:WebDX.Api.WDEFieldFlags.Completed
member.summary: The field has been processed.

member.name: T:WebDX.Api.WDEMiscFlags

member.name: T:WebDX.Api.VersionHelper
member.summary: VersionHelper is an internal static object that follows the Singleton pattern. This object will contain dictionaries that are hard-coded to contain information related to which properties are filtered in the various versions. These dictionaries will only need to contain information on properties that have changed over the lifetime of the API versions. Properties not contained in the dictionaries will be assumed to be writable in any version.

member.name: P:WebDX.Api.VersionHelper.IsDataLost
member.summary: This property is a flag that indicates if there was data lost recollected during the write process.

member.name: P:WebDX.Api.VersionHelper.LostData
member.summary: This property contains the lost data recollected during the write process.

member.name: M:WebDX.Api.VersionHelper.Initialize
member.summary: Initialize can be used to clean up the lost data list and to perform other initialization functions as necessary.

member.name: M:WebDX.Api.VersionHelper.FilterPropertyOrCollection(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This will return true if the collection should be excluded during the write process. It will return false otherwise. The format of the property name will be Interface.Collection. For example: IWDEField.CharRepairs.
member.param: Collec

member.name: M:WebDX.Api.VersionHelper.LogDataLost(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The potential for data loss exists when writing out data to older versions. A method on VersionHelper should be created to log the occurrences of data loss
member.param: The memberName parameter will match the value passed into the FilterXXX method. In the case of enumeration values being filtered, the GetEnumerationString call on VersionHelper will call LogDataLoss itself and pass in the enumeration type name as the memberName value.
The value is the string representation of the value that would have been written out.
